## matchSchemaAgainstRuleSet() function

Checks if a given schema matches any rules within the provided rule set

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function matchSchemaAgainstRuleSet(ruleSet: RuleSet, schema: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ruleSet | RuleSet | The rule set containing rules to match schema against |
|  schema | string | The schema to be matched against the rule set |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
